boyfirend: Gerard Butler (? - Present)   '''Jennifer Joanna Aniston''' (born February 11, 1969) is an American actress. She became famous in the 1990s for her role as Rachel Green in the US sitcom ''Friends'', a role for which she won an Emmy Award, a Golden Globe Award, and a Screen Actors Guild Award.
